name: OX Tools Oil Tanned Leather Framing Rig with Padded Suspenders Leather Carpenter Tool Belt with Suspenders and Tool Pouches Dual Hammer Holsters OX-P263609
short_description: Comfortable - The Ultimate OX Tools' leather padded suspenders boast a padded support is made from heavy-duty nylon with foam support for added comfort while on the job.
Heavy Duty - The framers tool belt, pouches and suspenders are all reinforced with heavy duty rivets at common stress points to reduce common wear and tear that comes with working on a jobsite.
Ergonomic - A 3-Inch tool belt brings all the pieces together, adding support and comfort, increasing the ergonomics of the rig making it easier for you to wear for longer periods of time.
Quality Materials - The OX four piece framing rig is crafted from strong, high-quality, oil tanned leather to withstand any challenge while keeping a soft look and feel.
Adjustable - A fully adjustable chest strap and leather loops help to secure attachments to your tool belt, making carrying tool pouches and tools effortless.

name: Carhartt Legacy Tool Belt, Carhartt Brown
short_description: Rugged Poly with Rain Defender® durable water repellent
Duravax™ abrasion-resistant base
Pockets reinforced with coarse webbing to stay open and easy to access
Metal hammer loop
Compatible with Legacy Suspenders
product_description: Your tools are your right hand men and you need them within arm's length at all times. The Carhartt Legacy Tool Belt keeps your must have items organized and close at hand because your time is too valuable to be walking back and forth between tool bags all day. Built of heavy-duty Poly with Rain Defender durable water repellent. Both the Standard and the Deluxe offer adjustable belts and a variety of pockets for all your tools. Additional details: metal hardware, triple needle stitching for reinforcement where it counts, Carhartt logo patch. Carhartt Work Bags, Packs & Gear are covered by a Limited Warranty against manufacturing defects in materials and workmanship for the normal life of the product.

name: Gift for mens, Leather Tool Belt for Carpenter, Construction Pouch, Framers, Handyman, Electrician, Brown color, belts adjusts from 33'' up to 48''

name: Klein Tools 5415 Tool Belt, Heavy-Duty Leather Work Belt for Contractors, Construction, Carpenters, Electricians, Framers, Ironworkers, Medium
short_description: Strong, heavy-duty leather
Equipped with a double-tongue buckle
Embossed with a basket-weave pattern for added style
Fits waist sizes 36-Inch to 44-Inch
product_description: This Klein Tools Heavy-Duty Medium Embossed Tool Belt features leather material embossed with a basket-weave pattern for added style. Stop searching through your tool bag. Klein Tools' tool belts help provides separate storage for needed tools, gloves and parts for easy access. The belt is secured by a double-tongue buckle and is made to fit 36-44-inch waist sizes. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

name: 3-Inch Wide Full Grain Leather Tool Belt – Heavy Duty Oil Tanned Construction with Thick Stitching & Reinforced Rivets – Thick Work Belt for Carpenter, Electrician, Construction
short_description: 🛠️ Durable Full Grain Leather - Crafted from 100% full grain leather that resists cracking, splitting, and stretching—ideal for long-term, heavy-duty use on any job site.
🔩 Heavy Duty Oil-Tanned Finish - Treated with a rich oil-tanned finish to improve flexibility and toughness while adding a rugged, professional appearance.
🧵 Double-Stitched for Reinforcement - Precision double stitching throughout the belt ensures structural integrity and long-lasting strength under load.
🔧 3-Inch Extra Wide Support - A wide 3” profile offers superior back support and weight distribution—perfect for holding tool pouches, holsters, and accessories without sagging.
🔒 Rivet-Reinforced for Strength - Strategically placed metal rivets add extra security at stress points, preventing premature wear and tear during daily use.
👷 Built for Tradesmen & DIYers - Ideal for carpenters, framers, electricians, handymen, and construction workers who rely on dependable gear every day.
product_description: Experience the difference that quality craftsmanship makes with our 3-Inch Wide Full Grain Leather Tool Belt, purpose-built for professionals who demand strength, durability, and long-lasting performance. Whether you’re a carpenter, electrician, framer, plumber, or dedicated DIY enthusiast, this rugged leather belt delivers dependable support for all your essential tools. ✅ Premium Full Grain Leather Construction This tool belt is made from 100% full grain leather, the highest grade available. Unlike bonded or split leather alternatives, full grain leather retains the toughest, most natural part of the hide—offering unmatched strength, resistance to wear, and a finish that improves with age. You’ll notice the difference from the first time you wear it. ✅ 3-Inch Extra Wide Support Design The 3-inch wide design offers exceptional lumbar support, making it ideal for long days on the job. Whether you’re climbing ladders, crouching, or lifting heavy gear, this wider profile distributes weight evenly across your lower back to reduce fatigue and increase comfort. ✅ Oil-Tanned Finish for Maximum Flexibility The leather is treated with a rich oil-tanning process, which makes the material more supple and resistant to moisture. It also enhances the belt's natural texture and color, giving it a professional, rugged look that complements any jobsite gear. ✅ Thick-Stitched Seams & Heavy-Duty Rivets Durability is built into every detail. High-tensile nylon stitching runs through all seams for superior reinforcement, while steel rivets are placed at high-stress points to add extra strength. This belt is engineered to handle daily abuse, heavy tool loads, and the toughest conditions. ✅ Perfect Fit for Work Pouches & Holsters Designed with a flat profile and uniform width, this tool belt pairs easily with a wide range of tool pouches, nail bags, hammer loops, drill holsters, and more. Whether you’re outfitting for finish work or rough carpentry, you’ll appreciate the compatibility and secure fit. ✅ Built for Professionals Who Rely on Their Gear We understand that when you're on the clock, your gear needs to work as hard as you do. That’s why this belt is trusted by construction professionals, contractors, tradesmen, field technicians, and serious DIYers who expect performance and value. ✅ Timeless Look, Long-Term Value Not only does this belt perform well—it also looks the part. The natural grain and oil finish age beautifully over time, developing a unique patina that tells the story of every job well done. It’s more than a belt—it’s a tool in itself. 🧰 Use Cases & Compatibility 🔨 Ideal for framing, roofing, woodworking, electrical work, HVAC, and general construction 🧰 Compatible with all standard belt-loop tool pouches, suspenders, and accessories 🔧 Available in multiple waist sizes to ensure a perfect, secure fit ⚙️ Specifications Material: 100% Full Grain Leather Width: 3 inches (7.62 cm) Stitching: High-density thick-stitched seams Finish: Oil-tanned for softness and water resistance Reinforcements: Solid metal rivets at key stress points Fit: Available in 3 different sizes for waist measurements
